entries.femaleVariant:
Elizabeth: Carol says they'll make the next shipment on Tuesday.
Iron: Perfect, the whisky I promised Cassidy will arrive before then.
Elizabeth: Dakota has dibs on half the shipment.
Iron: Take what you need and we'll send the rest to Dogtown.
Elizabeth: Barghest haven't discovered the drones?
Iron: No, the radar coverage map we got from Hands is accurate.
Elizabeth: What if someone sees them flying over the wall?
Iron: They're fitted with Optical Camo, as long as they don't hit anything they'll be fine.

Is life in Night City too fast and noisy for you?
Do you prefer a quiet trailer in Red Peaks or Rocky Ridge Plains?
Have you found an abandoned container but don't have a Crowbar?
Or did your Javelina get a flat but you lost your Tire Iron in a Haboob?

Then come on down to DaKota Garage off I-9 where our expert staff will help you find the melee weapon of your dreams!

Even if you're not in the market for a new weapon, help yourself to our free coffee and get Energized for the road ahead!
